cleaned_text: Image 1 of Ocean Essence Meditation $5.00 Sometimes we need a little support when undergoing personal transformation. This guided meditation can be used with or without the Ocean Essence as a way to connect with the Ocean. Vocalize the grief you carry with the support of the energy of the Ocean, my words to guide you, and a drum to support your journey. This is a downloadable audio file. Once you make your purchase, you will receive a link to securely download the file to the email entered during checkout. The link will expire 24 hours after your purchase. If you click on the link after it has expired, a new link will automatically be sent to you. Audio file is 20 minutes in length.
